title: Why is this S+?
body:
I'm trying to understand why I got an S+. {{champion:99}} 

I don't think I've ever seen S+ with more than 1 death.

I did the least damage on my team, I took/healed the least damage, all my wards are from my trinket, I earned the least gold, and I killed the least minions.
It was a 23-minute game.

I last hit the nexus. That couldn't possibly affect it... could it?

p.s. Ezreal/Shyvana got S-/S.

http://imgur.com/a/4j2iX

replies.body:
Your kda was 10.5 a kda of 10 is usually enough for a basis of one of the s ranks  (usually S-), and with the recent elementalist lux release the bad portion of lux players had a flux which swayed lux's average score lower than it used to, making s ranks easier to obtain.

____

Valid reasoning.

http://imgur.com/a/Lvg7L
http://imgur.com/a/ViBvw

I mean 2 whole tests. I must be a flipping genius, no way these tests are in any way inaccurate.  So I must be right.
its your assists, high kill participation will grant you an S
